c1.name: Yakan Offering
c1.descriptionRaw: Each time <color=#FFD780FF>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.
c1.description: Each time Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

c2.name: Fox's Mooncall
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Sesshou Sakura</color> start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.
c2.description: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

c3.name: The Seven Glamours
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sakura Channeling
c4.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>Sesshou Sakura</color> lightning hits opponents, the <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG Bonus</color> of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.
c4.description: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the Electro DMG Bonus of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

c5.name: Mischievous Teasing
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou
c6.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>The Sesshou Sakura's</color> attacks will ignore 60% of the opponents' DEF.
c6.description: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponents' DEF.
